Title: Thailand counts votes in early election with 3 main parties vying for power
Description: Vote counting was underway in Thailand's early general election on Sunday, seen as a three-way race among competing visions of progressive, populist and old-fashioned patronage politics.

Title: Savannah Guthrie says 'we will pay' for mother's return in video plea to potential abductor

Title: Cisco CEO explains why he thinks it's 'stupid' to interview internal candidates for a promotion
Description: Cisco CEO Chuck Robbins said there are three big traits the people "who are wildly successful" in tech all share.

Title: Jeff Bezos speaks out about The Washington Post for the first time since mass layoffs and focuses on 'data'
Description:
Washington Post owner Jeff Bezos has put out his first statement since the paper's cuts.
He said "data tells us what is valuable and where to focus."

Title: WATCH: Savannah Guthrie in new video pleads for mother's return: 'We will pay'
Description: "Today" show host Savannah Guthrie and her siblings released a new video on Saturday saying they have received a message and begged for the return of their missing mother.

Title: This weird deep-sea creature was named by thousands of people online
Description:
A newly discovered deep-sea creature has become an unlikely Internet star.

Title: You Need To Avoid This Huge RAM Problem When Buying Your Next Laptop

Title: Mutter Nancy Entführt: US-Moderatorin Guthrie an Entführer: „Wir werden zahlen“
Description:
Vor einer Woche verschwand die 84-jährige Nancy Guthrie.
Ihre Tochter, die US-Fernsehmoderatorin Savannah Guthrie, wendet sich in einer neuen Videobotschaft an die mutmaßlichen Entführer ihrer Mutter.

Title: India and Malaysia pledge to bolster trade, defence collaborations
Description: Both countries emphasize comprehensive partnerships spanning semiconductors, defence, healthcare and food security.

Title: From blackouts to food shortages: How US blockade is crippling life in Cuba

Title: Weekly deals: OnePlus 13 is back with a vengeance, Pixel 10 Pro and 10 Pro XL on sale

Today, we’re going with the second one.
